SourceProxy.label: PDAL Reader
SourceProxy.name: PDALReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads LIDAR data using the PDAL library

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PDAL Reader reads LIDAR data using the PDAL library. See the readers section on www.pdal.io for the supported formats. It produces a vtkPolyData with point data arrays for attributes such as Intensity, Classification, Color, etc.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PDAL reader.
